title: Meridian New World (1.02 Patch) (GOG)
description:
Hey guys, here the latest patch for meridian new world. Hope you enjoy and please seed. This only works for the gog version. You can find the gog version below.
 <a href="
http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/11136759/Meridian_New_World_%28GOG%29" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/11136759/Meridian_New_World_%28GOG%29</a>


---------------


Changes for version 1.02:

NEW CONTENT:

- New skirmish map: "Clash" is an 1v1v1v1 free-for-all map
- Added Czech language pack
- Added Portugese language pack

BUG FIXES:

- Fixed a crash which occured when the enemy AI was trying to attack a player that was already defeated
- Fixed the position of options windows on lower resolutions
- Fixed a bug which caused an enemy Light Factory to initiate production even if there wasn't enough food
- Fixed the German language pack
